author: Ella Ceron
title: Yes, You Should Wash Your Hands Before You Put On Your Coronavirus Face Mask
description: To answer your questions about face masks and coronavirus, MTV News called Dr. Darien Sutton-Ramsey, an emergency physician in New York, to help break down everything you need to know about wearing cotton masks, why they work, and how to keep yours as clean a…
content: A certain world leader is choosing not to follow guidelines by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention when it comes to face masks. But experts pretty much all agree that you should definitely. wear cloth masks in public, especially if you are going to… [+14230 chars]
